page.title: 06BRIGHTON POLYTECHNIC
page.content: There are about{7200 students} here,about 5000 of them are full time the rest are part time. They are taught by upto{600 lecturers}.They start at 09.00 and the Polytechnic is in use upto 21.00. Some of the classes have upto 120 students in them. There are roughhly{300 foreign students}who have to pay fees to go there,the rest normally have a grant. The Polytechnic was first built in 1965 and more buildings have been added since.They run nearly{300} {different courses}; some in the day and some in the evenings.No one is supposed to smoke in the lessons but we found lots of ashes etc. in the bins as there are no ashtrays. There are 1000's of rooms but it would take over a week, non stop, to count them all.
